name: Vehicles without required equipment or in unsafe condition
text:
PART II.  INSPECTION OF VEHICLES
 
         No person shall drive or cause to move on any highway any motor vehicle, trailer, semitrailer, or pole trailer, or any combination thereof, unless the equipment thereon is in good working order and adjustment as required in this part so as not to endanger the driver or other occupant or any person upon the highway. [L 1967, c 214, pt of §2; HRS ]
